#服务器设置及软件使用

= 服务器设置 =

  * 编辑manager.conf
  {{{[general]
displaysystemname = yes
enabled = yes
webenabled = no
port = 5038
;httptimeout = 60
bindaddr = 0.0.0.0
;displayconnects = yes
timestampevents = yes

[freeiris]
secret = freeiris
deny=0.0.0.0/0.0.0.0
permit=127.0.0.1/255.255.255.0
writetimeout = 100
read = system,call,log,verbose,command,agent,user
write = system,call,log,verbose,command,agent,user
[langtoo]
secret = 20102010
read  = call
}}}
